text: Pig Farm is a town in the Accra Metropolitan district, Pig farm has now surpassed Maamobi and Nima in crime rates, Pig farm has recorded the highest school dropouts in the ayawaso constituency... It has one of the highest crime rates in the country district of the Greater Accra Region of Ghana.2019 edition of Ghana's strongest was won by a man by name Shakazulu who is located at pig farm ==References== Category:Populated places in the Greater Accra Region Category:Greater Accra Region
title: Pig Farm
